news.title: Netflix walks away from its deal to buy Warner Bros. after Paramount came back with a better offer

news.title: Jack Dorsey’s Block cuts nearly half of its staff in AI gamble
news.summary: Jack Dorsey's Block, the financial tech company that runs Square and the Cash app, is cutting its workforce by "nearly half" and axing more than 4,000 jobs.
